title: Ronan O'Gara
summary: Ronan John Ross O'Gara (Irish: Rónán Ó Gadhra, born 7 March 1977) is an Irish former rugby union player and current coach. O'Gara played as a fly-half and is Ireland's second most-capped player[1] and highest ever points scorer. He is currently head coach of La Rochelle in the French Top 14.
